About Me

🤖 AI-First Azure Cloud Expert | Transforming businesses through intelligent cloud solutions

I am an AI-First Azure Cloud Expert with over 20 years of professional experience in software development. My approach centers on leveraging Artificial Intelligence to create smarter, more efficient cloud solutions that drive real business value.

My expertise spans AI-powered microservices architecture for containerized .NET applications with Kubernetes and Docker, and comprehensive Microsoft Azure Cloud development (SaaS and PaaS). I specialize in integrating AI capabilities into cloud applications using Azure AI services, machine learning pipelines, and intelligent automation.

I work with diverse databases including Azure SQL Server, PostgreSQL, Azure Cosmos DB, MongoDB, and Redis, often implementing AI-driven data analytics and insights. My architectural expertise includes Clean Architecture, Test-Driven Development, and Domain-Driven Design (DDD) with a focus on AI-ready, scalable solutions.

As an Agile team member using Scrum methodology with Azure DevOps, I champion AI-first development practices and mentoring teams on intelligent cloud architectures. My frontend skills cover modern JavaScript frameworks like React and Polymer, often integrated with AI-powered user experiences.
